name: article-vector-store
label: Article Vector Store
description: HTTP server exposing a vector database of PDF articles with search and full-content retrieval.

tools.name: search_articles
tools.description: Search for relevant articles in the vector store and return a ranked list of matches.

query.description: Natural language query describing the topic or content to search for.

top_k.description: Maximum number of distinct articles to return.

tools.name: get_article_content
tools.description: Retrieve the full concatenated content for a given article_id from the vector store.

article_id.description: Logical article identifier returned by search_articles (e.g., 'tech_tech_1').
